CardData.Name: Afterlife
CardData.Description: For one turn, you cannot receive any damage. On this same turn, you cannot inflict any damage. (Debuffs can still land.)

CardData.Name: No More Pain
CardData.Description: Remove all debuffs from one ally and heal that ally for 15% of their Max HP

CardData.Name: Tip the Scales
CardData.Description: Attack target for 20 damage. Heal ally with lowest HP for equal amount of damage dealt.

CardData.Name: We Can Do It
CardData.Description: Remove one debuff from all enemies. Apply healing buff that heals for 10% of your Max HP each turn for 3 turns
